en: I'm a citizen of the world.
I am a citizen of the world.
The boy threw a stone.
zh: 那个男孩扔了一块石头。

en: This time it's my turn to pay.
What on earth are you looking at?
John made Mary jump.
I got a sunburn.
I learn ten new words every day.
zh: 我每天学习十个新单词。

en: Tom didn't know the meaning of "anglophobia," so he did a quick web search to see if he could find out what it meant.
zh: 汤姆不知道“仇英”是什么意思，所以他快速地在网上搜索了一下，看看能不能找到它的意思。

en: God is in the detail.
Listen!
It has been six years since I started to study English.
zh: 我开始学习英语已经六年了。

en: I was nine years old when I asked my mother whether Father Christmas really existed.
zh: 我九岁的时候问我妈妈圣诞老人是否真的存在。

en: She can take control of the situation.
I've become very sleepy.
I have a gift for you.
zh: 我为你准备了一份礼物。

en: I have to find that.
Isn't it nice when the newcomers are still so innocent?
zh: 当新来者还如此天真的时候，这难道不是很好吗？

en: I was really surprised to hear that this cultivator cost as much as 1 million yen.
zh: 我真的很惊讶听到这个耕耘机竟然要100万日元。

en: I forget, do they have a panda at the Ueno Zoo?
zh: 我忘了，上野动物园有熊猫吗？

en: Excuse me, do you mind if I sit here?
zh: 打扰一下，你介意我坐这儿吗？

en: I won't let you escape.
Tell me about this girl.
We're not as young as we used to be.
zh: 我们不像以前那么年轻了。

en: However, I am not a specialist.
We uploaded the pictures from our wedding on Facebook.
zh: 我们把婚礼的照片上传到脸书了。

en: I love Aimer's songs.
I have to pay a little more attention.
Please don't drink beer before going to bed.
zh: 请不要在睡觉前喝啤酒。

en: She's my wife.
She has a mysterious air about her.
zh: 她身上有一种神秘的气息。

en: It was a wrong number.
He is diligent.
I can't reply to you immediately.
Please, help my daughter.
Have you come to file a damage report?
Have you come to register a crime?
I'm not a handyman.
Don't go there.
What relieves the pain?
It's the funniest dog in the world.
zh: 它是世界上最有趣的狗。

en: Are you trying to hit on me?
You have to push that door to open it.
zh: 你得推那扇门才能打开它。

en: If you push it, the door will open.
If you push the button, the door will open.
zh: 你按一下按钮，门就会开了。

en: She was injured in a car accident.
zh: 她在一次车祸中受伤了。

en: She has nice legs.
This is the first time I've heard about it.
zh: 这是我第一次听说这件事。

en: It's the first time I've heard that.
Her cooking is the best.
Her cooking is amazing.
Keep your hands off my daughter!
zh: 把你的手从我女儿身上拿开！

en: May I ask who you are?
I haven't been busy for these past two days.
My job is strangling rats.
Those are the most expensive shoes I've ever seen.
zh: 那些是我见过的最贵的鞋子。

en: That's right, when you greet him you must strangle him with all your strength. He'll be glad.
zh: 没错，你跟他打招呼的时候一定要用尽全力掐死他。他会很高兴的。

en: It's inevitable.
It seems as if my daughter is faintly aware that I'm not her real mother.
zh: 我女儿似乎隐约意识到我不是她的亲生母亲。

en: This is a real Vuitton.
You're not young anymore.
Please understand my position.
I somehow understand your feelings.
zh: 我多少能理解你的感受。

en: His affection towards me has decreased.
Nice timing.
You don't need to worry about wiretapping.
Astronauts wear spacesuits.
Cosmonauts wear spacesuits.
Just between you and me, that fat ugly witch is on a diet.
zh: 就你我之间说，那个又胖又丑的巫婆正在节食。

en: I miss you when you're not here.
zh: 你不在的时候，我很想你。

en: Do you think that male leggings are cool?
zh: 你觉得男士紧身裤酷吗？

en: The walls are bloody.
Do you want to play football with us?
zh: 你想和我们一起踢足球吗？

en: When I was asked by my wife where I was going tomorrow and with whom, I rushed it and ended up giving a confused answer.
zh: 当我妻子问我明天要去哪里和谁一起去时，我匆忙回答，结果给出了一个含糊不清的答案。

en: I bought a commemorative medal on my trip.
zh: 我在旅行中买了一枚纪念章。

en: I like horses.
There aren't only nice people in the world.
Senpai, would you buy me some soft ice cream?
zh: 前辈，你能给我买个甜筒冰淇淋吗？

en: Look, it's the North Star.
She's a little devil.
The flying squirrel came flying down from the tree.
My older sister is a female ninja.
My sister is a kunoichi.
We have no second choice.
Rodrigo's family went to the dog pound to adopt a dog.
zh: 罗德里戈一家去了动物收容所领养一只狗。

en: Some sentences don't make sense. So what?
zh: 有些句子没有意义。那又怎样？

en: Three out of four Americans believe in the existence of paranormal phenomena.
zh: 四分之三的美国人相信超自然现象的存在。

en: "Thoughtfulness" is a long word in English.
Men are children their whole life.
The boat is heading toward the harbor.
I'm also dating someone from the office.
zh: 我也在和办公室的人约会。

en: Not everyone is dishonest.
My cat looks sad.
That's an old tale.
I don't want anything.
You scared me, Robert!
The former President's death was announced.
Have you ever eaten teppanyaki?
Whether the medicine will work or not is uncertain.
zh: 这药是否有效还不确定。

en: He fell into critical condition.
They just had a very serious conversation.
zh: 他们刚刚进行了一次非常严肃的谈话。

en: I like Alex Marcelo.
zh: 我喜欢亚历克斯·马塞洛。

en: Bookmark this site.
I like you very much!
He got the section chief's daughter pregnant and was demoted.
zh: 他搞大了科长的女儿的肚子，然后被降职了。

en: Who the hell do you think you are?
What do you think you are doing, talking down to me like that?
zh: 你以为你在干什么，那样跟我说话？

en: The most important thing in a persons life is one's health.
zh: 一个人生命中最重要的是健康。

en: He poured me some mysterious tea.
zh: 他给我倒了一些神秘的茶。

en: Round boxes? Are you nuts?
These boxes are fragile.
The cardboard boxes are fragile.
The box is broken.
Make sure all the boxes are well sealed before they're delivered.
zh: 确保所有盒子在交付前都密封好。

en: Don't rely on him.
Once you decide to enter a profession, you can't change your mind on a whim.
zh: 一旦你决定进入一个行业，你就不能随意改变主意。

en: I don't make a promise to someone without taking it seriously.
zh: 我不会随便对别人做出承诺。

en: I happened to find a bicycle discarded at the roadside.
zh: 我碰巧在路边发现一辆被丢弃的自行车。

en: It won't work.
She was born in Switzerland.
She is getting older.
That's just a waste of taxpayer money.
zh: 那简直是浪费纳税人的钱。

en: May I eat this apple?
That guy doesn't know the meaning of the word harmony.
zh: 那家伙根本不懂和谐的意义。

en: That's very romantic!
It's quite cold this morning. Look, my breath comes out white.
zh: 今天早上真冷。你看，我呼出的气都是白色的。

en: My hand is so numb with cold that I can't move my fingers.
zh: 我的手冻得麻木了，手指都动不了了。

en: I wish that you had brought a heating pack. It's a necessary article in winter.
zh: 真希望你带了暖宝宝。这可是冬天必备的物品。

en: I wish that you had brought a kairo. It's a necessary article in winter.
zh: 真希望你带了暖宝宝。这可是冬天必备的物品。

en: Don't be so perverse!
He's a blue blood.
I got a perfect score on the math section.
zh: 我的数学部分得了满分。

en: We stayed at the most expensive hotel in town.
zh: 我们住在镇上最贵的酒店。

en: The Cold War may have ended, but the fear of war has not yet been removed from the minds of men.
zh: 冷战可能已经结束，但对战争的恐惧尚未从人们的脑海中消除。

en: Aren't you please going to sit down?
It's discouraging that the travel expenses add up to 20,000 yen.
zh: 旅行费用加起来竟然有两万日元，真让人沮丧。

en: When you are away, I feel lost.
zh: 你不在的时候，我感到很失落。

en: Mr Tanabe became unemployed.
He died from acute lymphoblastic leukemia.
zh: 他死于急性淋巴细胞白血病。

en: She had to rely upon her inner strength.
zh: 她不得不依靠她内心的力量。

en: He made promise after promise and then sought to get out of them.
zh: 他一次又一次地做出承诺，然后又想方设法地摆脱它们。

en: He tried to put me off with more promises.
zh: 他试图用更多的承诺来搪塞我。

en: He relies upon drink to escape from his worries.
It´s all very well in theory, but will it work in practice?
zh: 理论上讲一切都很好，但实际上行得通吗？

en: She finished her errand and returned home.
This segment is brought to you by the Ford Motor Company.
zh: 本环节由福特汽车公司赞助播出。

en: His suitcase was full of water.
zh: 他的手提箱里装满了水。

en: This explains everything!
Let's pick a name for the child.
zh: 我们给孩子起个名字吧。

en: This beer isn't cold enough.
That isn't enough.
It's magic.
Disgusting!
I arrived safe and sound this morning.
Tom depends on Mary too much.
She always urges him to try new things.
zh: 她总是敦促他尝试新事物。

en: Why do you love me?
When I was a child, I believed in Father Christmas.
zh: 我小时候相信圣诞老人。

en: Luxury and convenience do not equate to happiness.
zh: 奢华和便利并不等同于幸福。

en: It´s an excellent piece of work. You´ve certainly been polishing your skills, haven´t you!
zh: 这是一件非常出色的作品。你肯定一直在磨练你的技能，不是吗！

en: I recognize that person from somewhere.
zh: 我好像在哪见过那个人。

en: Can you speak Toki Pona?
I think I should be able to speak a little TokiPona.
zh: 我想我应该能说一点托基波纳语。

en: It looks like they have a good head.
Is there anything at all that I can do for you?
zh: 有什么我可以为你做的吗？

en: I can't find Tom. Has he gone already?
zh: 我找不到汤姆。他已经走了吗？

en: I can't find Tom. He hasn't already gone and left, has he?
zh: 我找不到汤姆。他不会已经走了吧？

en: Let's party!
That one is very rare.
It's a nice country to visit, but I wouldn't live there.
zh: 这是一个不错的旅游国家，但我不会住在那里。

en: If you're old and can't see, don't drive!
zh: 如果你老了，看不见了，就不要开车！

en: This sentence contains several mistakes.
zh: 这个句子包含几个错误。

en: Who are you looking for?
I don't know, she really has a condescending way of talking, don't you think? Sometimes it gets to me.
zh: 我不知道，她说话的方式真的很盛气凌人，你不觉得吗？ 有时候我受不了。

en: The teacher called the students in alphabetical order.
zh: 老师按字母顺序叫学生。

en: Next week, we're heading to the mountain.
Benjamin Franklin was an American statesman and inventor.
zh: 本杰明·富兰克林是一位美国政治家和发明家。

en: Benjamin Franklin was an American politician and inventor.
zh: 本杰明·富兰克林是一位美国政治家和发明家。

en: Mr. Smith is liked by all the students.
zh: 史密斯先生很受所有学生的喜爱。

en: Mr. Smith is liked by all his students.
zh: 史密斯先生很受他所有学生的喜爱。

en: This old car is always broken.
I wish I had the courage to speak about my feelings.
zh: 我希望我有勇气说出我的感受。

en: I read.
Sit down!
Will you do it?
You're nuts!
Would you like to play tennis on Sundays?
Why are we running?
Hay is for horses.
As soon as you're finished looking at the "kairanban," please give it to the next person.
zh: 你看完“回覧板”后，请传给下一个人。

en: As soon as you see the notice, please pass it along.
zh: 你一看到通知，请传下去。

en: If you don't like it, it is alright for you to leave.
zh: 如果你不喜欢，你可以离开。

en: It's me!
Forgive me.
Let me know when you find out what it is.
zh: 当你查出是什么的时候，请告诉我。

en: I want to become a journalist.
It was polite of him to offer his seat to the old man.
zh: 他很礼貌地把座位让给了老人。

en: She's been wearing the same hat for a month.
zh: 她已经戴同一个帽子一个月了。

en: There seem to be lots and lots of stars.
My kid is shy around strangers and always hides behind me.
zh: 我的孩子怕生，总是躲在我身后。

en: It sounds easier that way.
Tom rode his motorcycle across the United States.
zh: 汤姆骑着摩托车横穿了美国。

en: I'm going to the United States tomorrow.
There is a library in every city in the United States.
zh: 美国每个城市都有一座图书馆。

en: Where they burn books, they will in the end also burn people.
zh: 凡烧书的地方，最终必将烧人。

en: I met her in the winter.
I met her one winter day.
zh: 我在一个冬日遇见了她。

en: How long have you been in here?
You understand, right?
I'm disappointed.
Eliza is crying.
I am a big fan of the arts.
zh: 我是艺术的忠实爱好者。

en: Just wait a little please. He hasn't arrived yet.
I'm against it.
Show them to me.
Hold on.
Dogs bark.
Shut the door!
He learns fast.
I eat tofu.
We've seen him.
We've seen it.
What would you do?
Done.
You're lying.
He drank a beer.
I won't go anywhere without you.
zh: 我不会在没有你的情况下去任何地方。

en: You are really annoying.
You're really annoying.
You have a bachelor's degree.
I can't wait anymore.
As you wish.
Mike likes the cat.
I really need a massage.
I only meant it as a joke.
She is sitting on the bench.
Alice is sleeping in her room.
zh: 爱丽丝在她的房间里睡觉。

en: One important person and the stable boy arrived to the cow cabin the first of January. Therefore, there is only one plastic bowl left at the tea ceremony arbor.
zh: 一月一日，一位重要人物和马厩的男孩来到了牛棚。因此，茶道凉亭只剩下一个塑料碗了。

en: My grandmother can fly.
My grandmother is able to fly.
This sentence is not a translation. It's the original.
zh: 这句话不是翻译。这是原文。

en: He asked, "Do you love me?"
Without the random mutation of genes there would be no evolution.
zh: 没有基因的随机突变，就不会有进化。

en: He is definitely not a bad person.
God is bad.
A lot of flowers have bloomed.
I want to see a volcano.
Pizza, please.
He wants to be like me.
"Where is Grandma?" "She's sleeping on the couch."
zh: “奶奶在哪里？” “她在沙发上睡觉。”

en: I can't leave Sysko alone.
He says I speak too fast, but this is how we speak Portuguese.
zh: 他说我说话太快，但我们葡萄牙语就是这么说的。

en: What are you selling?
God gave us the power to love.
zh: 上帝给了我们爱的力量。

en: Europe has addressed energy issues and climate change far more seriously than the United States has.
zh: 欧洲比美国更认真地对待能源问题和气候变化。

en: You betrayed me. Why?
In everything, one should consider the end.
zh: 凡事都应该考虑到结局。

en: "I think it's kinda weird," he said.
"If you'll excuse me..." he said. I think it's a shame.
zh: “如果你们允许我先告退……”他说。我觉得很遗憾。

en: "He probably wants to eat some shaved ice," he said.
Please delete this sentence.
I waited for fifteen minutes.
Please be sure to close the cap properly after use.
zh: 使用后请务必盖紧瓶盖。

en: It stinks.
I'm not hungry.
I have just finished eating.
I added this website to my favorites.
zh: 我把这个网站添加到了我的收藏夹。

en: There's no substitute for hard work.
zh: 努力工作是无法替代的。

en: I bought a Nintendo 3DS.
Do you have a Playstation 3?
Sega used to make video game consoles a long time ago.
zh: 世嘉以前生产过游戏机，很久以前了。

en: There's no cure for stupidity.
She's upset right now.
I met her last winter.
I met her in the winter three years ago.
zh: 三年前的冬天我见过她。

en: I met her in the winter a number of years ago.
zh: 几年前的冬天我遇见了她。

en: I met her on a certain winter day.
zh: 在某个冬日我遇见了她。

en: I met her in the winter of last year.
I met her in the winter several years ago.
zh: 几年前的冬天我遇见了她。

en: These sentences are not directly linked.
zh: 这些句子没有直接联系。

en: The cake is a lie.
I want to eat ice cream.
I'm learning Japanese.
The Internet has exploded.
You and I are soulmates.
I like dancing too.
Isn't it so?
Please be sure to close the windows before you go out.
zh: 请务必在出门前关好窗户。

en: You've been up to mischief again!
I've never been better.
He has blue eyes.
I think that this is a sunny spot.
zh: 我觉得这里是个阳光充足的地方。

en: People who think they can do anything are generally good for nothing.
zh: 认为自己什么都能做的人通常一事无成。

en: She is a little shy.
You're out of your mind.
The people going to Ueno Park are lonely.
zh: 去上野公园的人是孤独的。

en: It used to be taboo for women to smoke.
What's the difference between a miniskirt and a microskirt?
zh: 迷你裙和超短裙有什么区别？

en: He's a talented young director.
zh: 他是一位才华横溢的年轻导演。

en: That was close.
Tom was astounded and fascinated by what he saw there.
zh: 汤姆被他所看到的景象惊呆了，并且深深地着迷。

en: Tom was sad when he discovered that Mary was a gold digger and Mary was sad when she discovered that Tom was poor.
zh: 当汤姆发现玛丽是个拜金女时，他很伤心；当玛丽发现汤姆很穷时，她也很伤心。

en: Let's all pray together.
Mary was Tom's high school crush.
zh: 玛丽是汤姆高中时的暗恋对象。

en: Mary used her time machine to cheat on the exam.
zh: 玛丽用她的时间机器在考试中作弊。

en: That's what she said.
Mary had an out-of body experience while meditating.
zh: 玛丽在冥想时经历了灵魂出窍。

en: When Mary saw Tom naked, she started laughing.
zh: 当玛丽看到汤姆裸体时，她开始大笑。

en: Tom admitted his defeat.
This is a lion.
What is psychoanalysis?
Who is this boy?
That is essential.
I'd like you very much to accept my request.
zh: 我非常希望你能接受我的请求。

en: I fear for the future of mankind.
zh: 我为人类的未来感到担忧。

en: Tom broke up with his girlfriend.
zh: 汤姆和他的女朋友分手了。

en: Mary thinks that Oliver is still too young to have a girlfriend.
zh: 玛丽认为奥利弗年纪太小，不适合交女朋友。

en: Tom is a narcissist.
What's her name again?
Greece can no longer pay off its debts.
zh: 希腊已经无力偿还债务了。

en: That people should be wiped off the face of the Earth.
zh: 那些人应该从地球上被抹去。

en: Really? Are you going to quit?
It seems silly that you are the one having to quit when it was his fault.
zh: 明明是他的错，却要你来辞职，这似乎很荒谬。

en: Don’t you think it’s strange that although it was his fault, you’re the one quitting?
zh: 你不觉得很奇怪吗？明明是他的错，却要你来辞职？

en: Okay.
You're the tallest one.
Tom loves ice-cold drinks.
Tom is a member of the NRA.
zh: 汤姆是美国步枪协会的成员。

en: Tom is in favor of gun control.
Tom bought a webcam.
zh: 汤姆买了一个网络摄像头。

en: Tom's phone can take pictures.
I am afraid of heights.
Is that the key you are looking for?
I often confuse John and his twin brother.
zh: 我经常把约翰和他的双胞胎兄弟搞混。

en: Learning foreign languages is boring.
Poets cannot live without love.
I have to lose weight, so I'm going on a diet.
zh: 我必须减肥，所以我要节食。

en: Can you see the invisible man?
I hate Tom.
I want to give Mom a plant.
I want to give mum a plant.
He showed me a lot of beautiful photos.
zh: 他给我看了很多漂亮的照片。

en: I'm on the eighth floor.
Children are the flowers of life.
She loves the child as if it were her own.
zh: 她爱那个孩子，就像爱自己的孩子一样。

en: All of my siblings are taller than me.
zh: 我的所有兄弟姐妹都比我高。

en: I don't know where I am.
Loud music is bad for your health.
zh: 大声的音乐对你的健康有害。

en: Tom thinks that cars have faces.
The car is blue.
Mary was kidnapped by pirates.
Tom drank a lot of vodka on his trip to Russia.
zh: 汤姆去俄罗斯旅行时喝了很多伏特加。

en: That street was very noisy.
I've never dated her. It's just friendship.
zh: 我从来没有和她约会过。我们只是朋友。

en: I've never dated her. She's just a friend.
zh: 我从来没有和她约会过。她只是个朋友。

en: I asked whether the flowers were blooming.
Why do you insist? I already said no!
zh: 你为什么坚持？我已经说不了！

en: Won't it be dark in the rain?
The drawing is bad.
The drawing is faulty.
The drawing is defective.
The painting is deteriorating.
The weather report is faulty.
The weather report is defective.
The weather report is bad.
Is it not dark in the rain?

en: Don't look at me with such sad eyes.
zh: 别用这么悲伤的眼神看着我。

en: I only have one mouth, but I have two ears.
zh: 我只有一张嘴，却有两只耳朵。

en: Jump across.
Jump down.
I'm going to try.
That will be funny.
Reason retires once the unreasonable gets its way.
zh: 当不讲理的人得逞时，理性就会退场。

en: Get on!
I hate working.
What is the largest mountain in Japan?
Tom doesn't know the difference between Iraq and Iran.
zh: 汤姆分不清伊拉克和伊朗。

en: The Japanese watch Japan too much and don't know the situation overseas. Koreans watch Japan only and don't know the situation of their own country.
zh: 日本人太关注日本国内的情况，不了解海外的情况。韩国人只关注日本，不了解自己国家的情况。

en: They went up the stairs.
Wait!
Wait up.
Stay still!
Please wait.
The earth hath yielded her increase.
I'm prepared for the worst.
zh: 我已经做好了最坏的打算。

en: Didn't you see my keys?
Close the curtains! The guy living in the house across the street is a Peeping Tom.
zh: 把窗帘拉上！住在街对面房子里的家伙是个偷窥狂。

en: Close the curtains! It's because the person living in the house across the street is a voyeur.
zh: 把窗帘拉上！因为住在街对面房子里的人是个偷窥者。

en: I didn't see that.
You usually find out the value of things after losing them.
zh: 你通常在失去东西后才发现它们的价值。

en: I live near the levee.
Tom doesn't drink beer at home.
No one can foresee how that result will turn out.
zh: 没有人能预见到那个结果会如何。

en: I read some books.
I read a book.
I'll go buy some bread.
I know them inside out.
Holster your weapon.
What makes you think that Tom likes heavy metal?
zh: 你凭什么认为汤姆喜欢重金属音乐？

en: Pay attention.
That must have hurt!
Tom and Mary care for each other.
This house isn't very big.
Tom could not afford to go to the concert.
zh: 汤姆负担不起去看演唱会。

en: What are you good at?
Embrace your dreams.
It's so easy.
Tom has a natural talent.
Tom didn't know what Mary's last name was.
zh: 汤姆不知道玛丽的姓是什么。

en: Tom asked Mary what her last name was.
Tom was surprised to see John and Mary out on a date.
zh: 汤姆惊讶地看到约翰和玛丽在约会。

en: Tom saw John and Mary holding hands.
zh: 汤姆看到约翰和玛丽手牵着手。

en: I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name.
zh: 对不起，我没听清你的名字。

en: If a porter carries your luggage, don't forget to tip him.
zh: 如果搬运工帮你搬行李，别忘了给小费。

en: There is also a tendency to call "L'Auberge Espagnole" a pornographic film.
zh: 还有一种趋势是将《西班牙旅馆》称为色情电影。

en: I heard him humming in the shower.
zh: 我听到他在淋浴时哼着歌。

en: She got up and left in the middle of our conversation.
zh: 她站起来，在我们谈话中途离开了。

en: The elevator came to an abrupt halt.
Tom is a perfectionist.
I don't really know why, but they don't like me.
zh: 我真的不知道为什么，但是他们不喜欢我。

en: Alice has tried to lose weight.
Don't blame me.
You are morons.
Today I have to give my cat a bath.
zh: 今天我得给我的猫洗个澡。

en: They swam.
Could you translate this for me?
I need to write an article on Japan's economy.
zh: 我需要写一篇关于日本经济的文章。

en: It's boiling hot.
Wanting to build a snowman, the children eagerly awaited the first snow.
zh: 孩子们想堆雪人，所以急切地等待着第一场雪。

en: I have the exact same opinion as her.
zh: 我和她的意见完全一样。

en: We drank a lot.
The second course contains meat.
You're afraid of him, aren't you?
I just now signed the divorce papers, and with this I'm finally free!
zh: 我刚刚签了离婚协议，这样我就终于自由了！

en: Do you have nothing to say?
Our teacher gives out a lot of homework.
zh: 我们的老师布置很多作业。

en: You'll receive a notice in a few days.
The passing autumn fills me with a feeling of grief.
zh: 逝去的秋天让我感到悲伤。

en: Alpha, beta and gamma are Greek letters.
zh: 阿尔法、贝塔和伽马是希腊字母。

en: I've been waiting for this day to come.
zh: 我一直在等待这一天的到来。

en: Antiperspirant is useful.
I can sleep anywhere.
zh: 我可以在任何地方睡觉。

en: Just like that, hours, days and weeks passed.
zh: 就这样，几个小时、几天、几周过去了。

en: This sentence needs to be checked by a native speaker.
zh: 这句话需要母语人士检查一下。

en: Tom is a sociopath.
John kept his head above the water.
When I went to him he was sleeping, but I woke him up.
zh: 我去他那里的时候他在睡觉，但我把他叫醒了。

en: Stop talking and listen.
You're soaking wet.
Tom shrugged.
Tom continued to stare out the window.
Tom scored a hole in one.
Tom bounced back.
He's a liar.
All of the books are good, but none as good as this one.
zh: 所有的书都很好，但没有一本比得上这本。

en: This can is empty.
She says she's not dating anyone now, but I don't believe her.
zh: 她说她现在没有和任何人约会，但我不相信她。

en: To tell the truth, I don't really care.
I get anxious waiting for a friend for a long time.
zh: 我等朋友等太久会感到焦虑。

en: You think of the world too romantically.
zh: 你把世界想得太浪漫了。

en: She's not as beautiful as her mother.
zh: 她没有她妈妈那么漂亮。

en: Why are you studying?
Dad is taking a walk in the park.
My father is taking a walk in the park.
I had a leg cramp when swimming.
zh: 我游泳的时候腿抽筋了。

en: Lisa's room needs to be cleaned.
zh: 丽莎的房间需要打扫一下。

en: He said, "I plan to become a researcher."
zh: 他说：“我计划成为一名研究员。”

en: Could I speak with you for a moment?
zh: 我可以和你谈一会儿吗？

en: Tom fell into the mud.
Tom is slightly overweight.
This is not true love.
Tom is snoring.
Someone stole Tom's bicycle.
zh: 有人偷了汤姆的自行车。

en: Let me explain.
Tom wept.
Mary was impressed by the big organ in the church.
zh: 教堂里的大管风琴给玛丽留下了深刻的印象。

en: You'd better change your eating habits.
zh: 你最好改变你的饮食习惯。

en: Tom kneeled.
Mary is kneeling.
Mary appeared to be sleeping.
zh: 玛丽看起来像是在睡觉。

en: Tom's a likable guy.
zh: 汤姆是个讨人喜欢的人。

en: I need to make better use of my free time.
zh: 我需要更好地利用我的空闲时间。

en: Sign here.
This cola has gone flat and doesn't taste good.
This cola has lost its fizz and doesn't taste any good.
I won't tell anyone.
She had a flower in her hand.
We're playing tennis this weekend.
zh: 我们这个周末要打网球。

en: We plan to play tennis this weekend.
zh: 我们计划这个周末打网球。

en: She is trying to prove the existence of ghosts.
zh: 她试图证明鬼魂的存在。

en: I know that you've been avoiding me.
zh: 我知道你一直在躲着我。

en: Today is Saturday and tomorrow is Sunday.
zh: 今天是星期六，明天是星期天。

en: This machine is broken.
I've just gotten home.
I've just come home.
The end of my probation period is nearing.
Hello everyone, I'm Mike.
There are 35 students in this class.
Beijing is changing with great speed.
Look at that red-roofed house.
We'll be leaving before you get here.
zh: 我们会在你来之前离开。

en: A glass of red wine, please.
Cows are sacred animals to Hindus.
zh: 牛在印度教徒眼中是神圣的动物。

en: Do you have any siblings?
He acted just as if there were nothing.
zh: 他表现得好像什么都没发生一样。

en: She speaks not only German and French, but English as well.
zh: 她不仅会说德语和法语，还会说英语。

en: I'm very afraid of snakes.
The two men blamed each other for the crime.
zh: 这两个男人互相指责对方犯了罪。

en: I'm so worn out.
Wiener sausages are called Frankfurter sausages in Vienna.
zh: 维也纳香肠在维也纳被称为法兰克福香肠。

en: I like this old car more than a new one.
zh: 我喜欢这辆旧车胜过新车。

en: Copenhagen is the capital of Denmark.
zh: 哥本哈根是丹麦的首都。

en: I treated him like my own son.
zh: 我把他当成自己的儿子一样对待。

en: The facts proved that our worries were unnecessary.
zh: 事实证明我们的担心是多余的。

en: This is very difficult.
This is very hard.
Tom was sleeping.
Tom nodded.
Just as Max predicted, our team lost.
zh: 正如马克斯预测的那样，我们队输了。

en: I married off my daughter.
Tom has a big apartment.
zh: 汤姆有一套很大的公寓。

en: Could you help?
Applause broke out.
If you buy me an ice cream, I'll give you a kiss.
zh: 如果你给我买个冰淇淋，我就给你一个吻。

en: We went down by elevator.
Liar!
Tom called in sick.
I should've listened more carefully.
Christ is risen!
I need an assistant who speaks Korean.
zh: 我需要一个会说韩语的助理。

en: Tom was thrown from his horse.
Tom was covered with sweat.
Tom is lean and tall.
Who wrote the Bible?
Tom should have discussed it with his parents.
zh: 汤姆应该和他的父母商量一下。

en: Mary wore a pale blue dress.
zh: 玛丽穿着一件淡蓝色的连衣裙。

en: The Titanic hit an iceberg.
zh: 泰坦尼克号撞上了一座冰山。

en: There won't be nothing much, but please come by my house this evening.
zh: 不会有什么好东西，但今晚请来我家坐坐。

en: What's the minimum wage in your country?
zh: 你们国家的最低工资是多少？

en: My mom wants me to study in Switzerland.
zh: 我妈妈想让我去瑞士留学。

en: She is strong enough to carry the suitcase.
zh: 她力气很大，能提起这个行李箱。

en: It's not that easy, huh?
It's not raining.
It isn't raining.
Yes, it's just this.
Did you think that I was joking?
He read a book all morning.
Sit down. You are not allowed to stand up.
My friend went to Canada.
When I was in high school, I woke up at 6 every morning.
zh: 我上高中的时候，每天早上六点起床。

en: Tom and Mary are living together.
Tom is in a lot of trouble.
This food is gluten-free.
I don't think that he is sincere.
I don't think he is sincere.
I don't think that he's honest.
What kinds of plants are you growing in your garden?
zh: 你在你的花园里种什么植物？

en: Have you finished dinner?
Everyone inside the building felt the earthquake.
zh: 建筑物里的每个人都感觉到了地震。

en: Can I sit here?
The moon has no atmosphere.
Don't worry. Didn't I say that everything would go well?
zh: 别担心。我不是说过一切都会顺利的吗？

en: Do you think that I'm handsome?
Do you think I'm getting fat?
Do you have an account on twitter?
Tom was arrested for driving while drunk.
Tom was arrested for drunk driving.
Tom didn't know their names.
zh: 汤姆不知道他们的名字。

en: The Earth is blue like an orange.
zh: 地球是蓝色的，像橘子一样。

en: Nobody died.
Quit staring at me.
How did you get so good at backgammon?
zh: 你怎么这么擅长双陆棋？

en: Because I do not have children, I can spend more time volunteering than parents can.
zh: 因为我没有孩子，所以我可以比父母花更多的时间做志愿者。

en: Many people think that children spend all their time watching television.
zh: 很多人认为孩子们把所有时间都花在看电视上。

en: Many people think that children spend too much time watching television.
zh: 很多人认为孩子们花太多时间看电视。

en: What's for supper?
She spends many hours at the gym to lose weight.
zh: 她花很多时间在健身房减肥。

en: This bus is going in a different direction.
zh: 这辆公共汽车行驶的方向不同。

en: The farmer seeded the field with wheat.
zh: 农民在田里播种了小麦。

en: The farmer scattered the wheat seeds in the field.
zh: 农民把小麦种子撒在田里。

en: I have a twin sister.
She liked it.
It's made of leather.
I will eat chocolate.
There's no minimum wage here.
What did you just say?
The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want.
zh: 耶和华是我的牧者，我必不至缺乏。

en: We climbed to the top.
Tom was shot twice in the chest.
Tom was like a father to Mary.
zh: 汤姆对玛丽来说就像父亲一样。
